titles.title: To authorize salary adjustments for Justices and judges of the United States for fiscal year 2006.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Authorizes cost of living salary adjustments for Justices of the U.S. Supreme Court and other federal judges for FY2006.
